Special title page and separate foliation for: Antigone, ou La pieté, : tragedie de Robert Garnier ... -- A Paris : Par Mamert Patisson, 1580.
The two works were issued together, according to Brunet and Renouard.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 494.
